title.native: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？
title.romaji: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba Ii?
title.english: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

description:
Zagan might be the most feared evil sorcerer, but when it comes to social interactions, he’s the most inept. All those days studying the dark arts won’t help him when he falls in love at first sight with Nephelia, the beautiful elven slave, and spends his entire fortune to purchase her. With no clue how to talk to each other, the awkward arrangement for a bumbling sorcerer and timid elf begins.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: จอมมารอย่างข้า ควรรักภรรยาเอลฟ์อย่างไรดี

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

name.native: シャスティル・リルクヴィスト
ラーファエル・ヒュランデル

node.description:
__[Website](http://goto.cute.or.jp)__

Gotou began his career as an animator at Atorie. After the closing of Atorie, he worked for other studios such as Project Team Muu and Fenx before going freelancer. He serves as character designer, animation director and animator on countless anime series and contributes to a monthly comic strip to Newtype magazine.

He has been an animator since he graduated from high school at 18. Unlike most other animators Gotou had never gone to an art school. He became interested in animation after seeing an advertisement in an animation magazine saying that animators were needed. Without having any connections within the industry he went on and joined Atelier Giga and studied there for a year under [Akihiko Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/103299/) before marking his debut as animator on [Mister Ajikko](https://anilist.co/anime/3437/).

In 1988 Studio Atelier declared bancrupcy and he went to Project Team Muu, which later became Phoenix Entertainment. His first work there was as animator on Anime Sanjushi. When working on the Yuusha Saga, he met Ishida Atsuko on Densetsu no Yuusha Da Garn, who influenced Gotou in his character design, particularly the design of the eyes. Together with the experience from training under Yamashita Akihiko this influence resulted in Gotou's so called "gocky picture" later.

He made his debut as character designer on Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji 4 and his debut as series director on Kiddy Grade.

Married to [Megumi Kadonosono](https://anilist.co/staff/100963/).

(Source: Anidb)
_Note: Not to be confused with [廣實愛](https://anilist.co/staff/192173/Ai-Hirozane)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/905666002691567622) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/thebrowbeatofficial/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUBbwMZpLI6RphRylO22ROw) | [Website](https://thebrowbeat.jp/)

Alternative Rock 2-piece band project from Japan formed by actor Ryuuji Satou, aka "Ryuji" and Hakuei.

[__Website__ ](http://yamamotosayaka.jp/) | [__Twitter__ ](https://twitter.com/sayakaneon) | [__Instagram__ ](https://www.instagram.com/sayaka__714/)

Sayaka Yamamoto is a Japanese singer and songwriter most widely known for her work as a former member of the Japanese idol girl group NMB48, where she served as the leader of the group and as the captain of Team N. She is also a former member of AKB48's Team K. She made her debut as a solo artist in October 2016 with her first album "Rainbow" while she was still a NMB48 member.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - First Love Is Like a Nasty Disease That Everyone Catches Once
Episode 2 - First Love With Social Anxiety Tastes a Lot Like Moldy Bread
Episode 3 - The Quieter They Are, The Devastatingly Scarier They Are When Mad
Episode 4 - When An Archdemon Offers You Anything, You're Better Off Saying No
Episode 5 - Heartbreak Can Be Literally, Physically Painful
Episode 6 - If You're An Archdemon, You're Almost Obligated To Act Outrageously
Episode 7 - Even An Archdemon Should Know Better Than To Hit A Child
Episode 8 - I Found a Dragon and I Guess She's My Daughter Now
Episode 9 - The Angelic Knight Situation Sounds Like a Mess I'd Rather Not Get Involved In
Episode 10 - Of Course Parents Panic When Their Daughter Runs Away From Home
Episode 11 - It's Still Apparently an Angelic Knight's Duty To Slay Wicked Beasts
Episode 12 - Music At Night Is Lovely, But Maybe Too Much When You're Socially Awkward
